$p$ is the probability of treatment success as a function of $\mbox{MIC}$:

$$
p = e^{-\rho \cdot \mbox{MIC}}
$$

Transforming $p$ into an unbounded quantity:

$$
x = \log\left(\frac{p}{1 - p}\right)
$$
